str2: According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A space of time or interval; by extension, an individual opportunity; by implication, delay.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Trans: I bring near; intrans: I come near, approach. From eggus; to make near, i.e. approach.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Feminine Singular

str2: A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
A promise. From epaggello; an announcement.
Abraham, progenitor of the Hebrew race. Of Hebrew origin; Abraham, the Hebrew patriarch.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Apparently a primary word; a people.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I cause to increase, become greater (b) I increase, grow. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to grow, i.e. Enlarge.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To increase, multiply. From another form of plethos; to increase.
